name: Richard Lederer
description: '''Richard Lederer''' (born 10 June 1971), who often performs as Protector, is an [[Austria]]n metal musician most notable for being a member in the bands [[Summoning (band)|Summoning]], [[Die Verbannten Kinder Evas]], and [[Ice Ages (band)|Ice Ages]]. He also does the artwork for some of the albums that he plays music in.
